remarks: ` 0 ` is an additive identity.  This used to be one of our complex number axioms, until it was found to be dependent on the others.  Based on ideas by Eric Schmidt.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement: addid1 $p |- ( A e. CC -> ( A + 0 ) = A ) $.
